About Us

Empowering youth in pursuit of Technology Through Training Innovation and employment: Mission Pragati

Mission Pragati empowers youth by offering cutting-edge technology training and employment opportunities, equipping them with essential skills and knowledge to succeed in a rapidly evolving digital world.

Our Courses

We provide high quality course which are industry-relevant skill training that will help them in securing a better livelihood.
